member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.appendTo
member.summary: The jQuery selector to append the elements to. For ASP.NET, use 'form'.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.focus
member.summary: Focus in the first visible, enabled element?

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.opacity
member.summary: The opacity value for the overlay div, from 0 - 100

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.overlayId
member.summary: The DOM element id for the overlay div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.overlayCss
member.summary: The CSS styling for the overlay div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.containerId
member.summary: The DOM element id for the container div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.containerCss
member.summary: The CSS styling for the container div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.dataId
member.summary: The DOM element id for the data div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.dataCss
member.summary: The CSS styling for the data div

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.minHeight
member.summary: The minimum height for the container

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.minWidth
member.summary: The minimum width for the container

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.maxHeight
member.summary: The maximum height for the container. If not specified, the window height is used.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.maxWidth
member.summary: The maximum width for the container. If not specified, the window width is used.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.autoResize
member.summary: Resize the container if it exceeds the browser window dimensions?

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.autoPosition
member.summary: Automatically position the container upon creation and on window resize?

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.zIndex
member.summary: Starting z-index value

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.close
member.summary: If true, closeHTML, escClose and overClose will be used if set. If false, none of them will be used.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.closeHTML
member.summary: The HTML for the default close link. SimpleModal will automatically add the closeClass to this element.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.closeClass
member.summary: The CSS class used to bind to the close event

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.escClose
member.summary: Allow Esc keypress to close the dialog?

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.overlayClose
member.summary: Allow click on overlay to close the dialog?

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.position
member.summary: Position of container [top, left]. Can be number of pixels or percentage

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.persist
member.summary: Persist the data across modal calls? Only used for existing DOM elements. If true, the data will be maintained across modal calls, if false, the data will be reverted to its original state.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.modal
member.summary: User will be unable to interact with the page below the modal or tab away from the dialog. If false, the overlay, iframe, and certain events will be disabled allowing the user to interact with the page below the dialog.

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.onOpen
member.summary: The callback function used in place of SimpleModal's open

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.onShow
member.summary: The callback function used after the modal dialog has opened

member.name: P:SharpKit.jQuery.SimpleModalOptions.onClose
member.summary: The callback function used in place of SimpleModal's close
